record.attribute: Number of genes that are protein coding: it includes pseudogenes
Number of genes that code for products other than proteins (rRNA, tRNA etc.)
Number of genes annotated as pseudogenes
Number of genes that have comments,notes from the research community
Number of genes that have orthologous genes

Number of genes that have Single Nucleotide Polymorphism(s)
Number of genes that have evidence of expression (Transcript + Protein)
